long_description: The men's Stohlquist Ebb PFD is a great choice for comfort, and it works well with the seat backs found in many sit-on-top and recreational kayaks. Durable high-denier ripstop shell stands up to the tough love of paddling. Open sides enhance ventilation, and mesh shoulders and back enhance comfort. Cross-chest cinch strap design eliminates annoying ride up, and padded neoprene waistband feels nice against skin. 1.5 in. webbing belt, shoulder webbing and side webbing easily adjust to create a low-profile fit. You can take small extras along thanks to self-draining pockets that expand to store accessories or even a beverage. Center-zip design with noncorroding zipper allows easy entry. 4-way lash tabs on front and back let you secure accessories such as strobes or knives (not included). Short length of the Stohlquist Ebb won't interfere with seat backs.
short_description: The men's Stohlquist Ebb PFD is a great choice for comfort, and it works well with the seat backs found in many sit-on-top and recreational kayaks.
